Uses of Class
org.apache.commons.io.FileDeleteStrategy

Packages that use FileDeleteStrategy
Package
Description
org.apache.commons.io
Provides classes for working with streams, readers, writers and files.

  • Uses of FileDeleteStrategy in org.apache.commons.io

    Fields in org.apache.commons.io declared as FileDeleteStrategy
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final FileDeleteStrategy
    FileDeleteStrategy.FORCE
    The singleton instance for forced file deletion, which always deletes, even if the file represents a non-empty directory.
    static final FileDeleteStrategy
    FileDeleteStrategy.NORMAL
    The singleton instance for normal file deletion, which does not permit the deletion of directories that are not empty.

    FileCleaningTracker.track(File file, Object marker, FileDeleteStrategy deleteStrategy)
    Tracks the specified file, using the provided marker, deleting the file when the marker instance is garbage collected.
